item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2010/12/21/remembering-freebsd-2-2-1/#comment-3601">Jay Willis</a>.
Yep, lots of the old FreeBSD devs are at Apple now.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Jay Willis.

Yep, lots of the old FreeBSD devs are at Apple now.

item.title: By: Jay Willis
item.dc:creator: Jay Willis
item.description: I remember FreeBSD and going to the FreeBSD users group in SF. I read somewhere that a lot of those guys we meet work at Apple now.
item.content:encoded: I remember FreeBSD and going to the FreeBSD users group in SF. I read somewhere that a lot of those guys we meet work at Apple now.
